original: Ajjhattaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhā nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Bahiddhā
analyzed: ▁ajjhattaṃ ▁hetu ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na b a hi ddh ā ▁nahetu ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁bahiddhā

original: hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Ajjhattaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhā nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ▁ajjhattaṃ ▁nahetu ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na b a hi ddh ā ▁nan ahetu ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā

original: Bahiddhā nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhatto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
